author: simonetripodi
msg: even if it doesn't help fixing the NP_NULL_ON_SOME_PATH, at least it guarantees 'parameters[]' array is not null

author: markt
msg: Tribes ByteMessage will get corrupted if message size exceeds the underlying buffer size

author: markt
msg: Better exception messages for expression parsing failures that may help track down https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=51088

author: rhuijben
msg: (upgrade_with_missing_subdir): Expect that the incomplete directory is
restored before the actual update processing, instead of silently later on.

author: rhuijben
msg: (modcheck_callback): Handle directory externals like unversioned files, like
how we handled them in 1.6 with the custom status walker that just walked
